name: Woodcutter (Zengir2424)
description:
Woodcutting prototype. Walk around in a small area with trees. Use the axe for cutting down the trees. Not much of a gameplay more than cutting down trees.

This is my first project from Justin P Bernet's VR course. The goal was to make an project in 5 days with 3 hours per day limit. My own goal was to set up an project, create an grabbable axe and been able to use the axe to cut down trees. This for learning how to set up the project and interact with my first objects.
